reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We live in Doha and decided to stay here for a weekend. It was just lovely. The service is fantastic and the Spa is absolutely amazing. Pools are great and the private beach is a winner. It's not a crowded place and you really feel like you can unwind here. The spa/pool staff are really amazing. The pool and beach experience was finished off with an amazing Swiss shower in the stunning spa change rooms. We ate at the buffet and had some nice food - it wasn't the best meal I've had in Doha, but it wasn't bad. Also had a coffee in the Tea Room, and that was 1st class. The snacks and sweets are really good here and we probably enjoyed that more than the buffet. As for the rooms; exactly what you'd expect from the Four Seasons. Clean, comfortable, great bed and pillows for a really good sleep and top quality French soaps & shampoos. This is probably one of the best hotels in Doha and I would recommend it to anyone.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel

reviews.text: A recent trip combining business for my spouse and leisure for us both allowed us to stay in this hotel for ten days. From the moment we were greeted at the airport with a sedan to the hotel, to the moment the sedan returned me to the airport our stay at the Four Seasons exceeded our greatest expectations. Each time we entered the hotel we were greeted with a cheerful welcome back! When we asked for our car each time we arrived at the front of the hotel the car was running with the air conditioning system turned on and ready to go. What a camel ride? Talk to the concierge. Need to send something by FedEx, again immediately and efficiently dealt with. Want a massage? Lovely massage therapists from Bali provide excellent therapeutic massage. They have the best and largest therapeutic pool that I have ever used. Lovely outdoor pools, including a children's pool with a double dinosaur slide and two hot tubs. Want to sun on the beach? Beach staff will cover your chaise, arrange an umbrella, and bring an igloo cooler with ice and bottled water. First class with amazing staff from arrival to departure.
reviews.title: Absoulutely Fantastic

reviews.text: One night at this hotel this week. Was upgraded to a suite on arrival.
reviews.title: Beautiful.

reviews.text: In a word - sumptuous. Room is beautiful , bed amazing, bathroom and shower magnificent. Lobby etc are really tastefully done.
reviews.title: Outstanding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff - probably the best of any hotel we've stayed in. The welcome on arrival was without doubt the best. Arrived v.early from a night flight and the process was seamless. Was escorted straight to room where we checked in.
reviews.title: A new standard of 5 star
6 pools and a private beach! What more can you ask for
reviews.text: I agree with the previous reviewer that Doha is by no means exciting, compared to other middle eastern cities that I could have gone to. But I was here on transit and decided to spend a few days in Doha. I was here during Summer and Ramadan, which means you can't eat or drink in public during the day, drastically reduced hours for museum and restaurants etc.. all under the hot sun that reaches over 40 degrees C with over 90% humidity.

reviews.text: Very peaceful in hotel, my husband enjoyed a late night swim in the sea. Staff are friendly, efficient and service orientated!!! They have a beautiful spa, sad that we did not have time to make use of it. Business centre also very comfortable.
